name: The Small Christmas Game
storyline: In this small and cosy game, you play as Anna, who’s coming home for Christmas. But the Christmas spirit is far away in the village, since everyone is super stressed and busy. As you help people out, the village slowly gets more and more decorated until everyone is happy and can celebrate the holidays.
summary: Are you ready to get in the right mood for Christmas? Find some Christmas snacks, put on your favorite Christmas music and play The Small Christmas Game! A cute and fun fetch game to get you in the right mood for Christmas.
